##MEL data

```{r}
MEL<-subset(metadata,diagnostic == "MEL")
MEL_itch<-subset(MEL, itch == "True")

MEL_age<-MEL$age

Percent_itching_MEL<-length(MEL_itch$itch)/length(MEL$smoke)

MEL_bleed<-subset(MEL, bleed =="True")

Percent_bleedning_MEL<-length(MEL_bleed$bleed)/length(MEL$smoke)

MEL_hurt<-subset(MEL, hurt == "True")
Percent_hurting_MEL<-length(MEL_hurt$hurt)/length(MEL$smoke)

print(Percent_itching_MEL)
print(Percent_bleedning_MEL)
print(Percent_hurting_MEL)
```
